original_title: Legado Negado: A Escravidão no Brasil em um Guia Incorreto
overview: "Denied Legacy: Slavery in Brazil in an Incorrect Guide" is a professional analysis of the work "Guia Politicamente Incorreto da História do Brasil", written by journalist Leandro Narloch in 2009, which brings not only factual errors, but problematic interpretations about aspects of the history of Brazil.
title: Denied Legacy: Slavery in Brazil in an Incorrect Guide
